thread.title: Beyonce Sings "Love Drought" at 2017 Grammys While Pregnant - Beyonce's Grammy Awards Performance
thread.title_full: Beyonce Sings "Love Drought" at 2017 Grammys While Pregnant - Beyonce's Grammy Awards Performance

author: Eliza Thompson
title: Beyonce Sings "Love Drought" at 2017 Grammys While Pregnant - Beyonce's Grammy Awards Performance
text:
Pregnant Beyoncé's Grammys Performance Is the Most Beautiful Thing You'll Ever See 
She sang "Love Drought" and "Sandcastles." By Eliza Thompson Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below During the Grammys on Sunday, Beyoncé gave her first performance since announcing her pregnancy earlier this month, and as expected, it was incredible. Bey sang "Love Drought and "Sandcastles" from Lemonade , and recreated some of the visuals from the "Love Drought" portion of the film. It was beautiful and perfect and emotional and inspiring and basically every single positive adjective in the dictionary. Pity the rest of the people who have to sing during the remaining two hours of this show, because they cannot top this. Pretty much how everyone acts when @beyonce walks by #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/xjHH3cfzw2
